00039 #ifndef CONDITION_CACHE_HPP
00040 #define CONDITION_CACHE_HPP
00041 
00042 #include "ConditionInterface.hpp"
00043 #include "../internal/DataSources.hpp"
00044 
00045 namespace RTT
00046 { namespace scripting {
00047 
00048 
00054     class RTT_SCRIPTING_API ConditionCache
00055         : public ConditionInterface
00056     {
00057         boost::shared_ptr<ConditionInterface> mc;
00058         internal::AssignableDataSource<bool>::shared_ptr result;
00059     public:
00060         ConditionCache( ConditionInterface* c, internal::AssignableDataSource<bool>::shared_ptr ds = internal::AssignableDataSource<bool>::shared_ptr() )
00061             : mc(c), result( ds ? ds : new internal::ValueDataSource<bool>(false) )
00062         {
00063         }
00064 
00065         virtual ~ConditionCache()
00066         {
00067         }
00068 
00069         virtual bool evaluate()
00070         {
00071             result->set( mc->evaluate() );
00072             return result->value();
00073         }
00074 
00075         virtual void reset() {
00076             result->set( false );
00077         }
00078 
00079         internal::DataSource<bool>::shared_ptr getResult() { return result; }
00080 
00081         virtual ConditionInterface* copy( std::map<const base::DataSourceBase*, base::DataSourceBase*>& alreadyCloned ) const
00082         {
00083             return new ConditionCache( mc->copy(alreadyCloned), result->copy(alreadyCloned) );
00084         }
00085 
00089         virtual ConditionInterface* clone() const
00090         {
00091             return new ConditionCache( mc->clone(), result );
00092         }
00093     };
00094 }}
00095 
00096 #endif
